name: chordme
description: ChordMe - Lyrics and chords in a simple way

scripts.test:frontend:security: cd frontend && npm run test -- --run firestore-security-validation.test.ts
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && FLASK_CONFIG=test_config python -m pytest tests/ -v
scripts.test:backend:coverage: cd backend && FLASK_CONFIG=test_config python -m pytest tests/test_*.py -v --cov=chordme --cov-report=term --cov-report=html:htmlcov --cov-report=xml:coverage.xml --cov-report=lcov:coverage.lcov
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend:run && npm run test:backend && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:backend:coverage
scripts.test:security: cd backend && FLASK_CONFIG=test_config python -m pytest tests/test_owasp_security_audit.py -v
scripts.test:security:full: cd backend && FLASK_CONFIG=test_config python -m pytest tests/test_owasp_security_audit.py tests/test_security_enhancements.py tests/test_advanced_security_audit.py -v
scripts.security:scan: cd backend && python -m bandit -r chordme/ && python -m safety check

author: Tony Bolanyo
